channel.title: Guess.Js on Minko Gechev's blog
channel.description: Recent content in Guess.Js on Minko Gechev's blog

item.title: Introducing Guess.js - toolkit for enabling data-driven user-experiences on the Web
item.description: About two months ago I published my initial research[1] on data-driven bundling. A few weeks after that, I had the opportunity to present my work on RenderConf[2] in Oxford, UK. You can find the video below: The original goal of the article was to show how data can help in improving the user-perceived page load performance. There are two main techniques that I explained: Data-driven bundling. All routes are loaded lazily by default.
